title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4622.18 - Rental payment due
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4622.18 - Rental payment due

State Regulations

The rent charged a licensed authorized organization, for
use of premises in which to conduct games of chance, shall be paid in full by
check, within 48 hours after the conclusion of each license
period. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4622.18

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
